RIDRING


Poids : 0
RING01
Anneau
Un anneau est une fine lanière de métal précieux. Il sert en général d'ornement. Plus rarement, certains sont enchantés et permettent à quiconque les porte d'user de la magie qu'ils contiennent. Ils sont de ce fait très recherchés par les aventuriers.

PARAMÈTRES :

Poids : 0
Un anneau est une fine lanière de métal précieux. Il sert en général d'ornement. Plus rarement, certains sont enchantés et permettent à quiconque les porte d'user de la magie qu'ils contiennent. Ils sont de ce fait très recherchés par les aventuriers.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Poids : 0
RING02
Ring of Fire Resistance
Batalista's Passport
The grand mage Batalista intended this item to aid in his travels in the plane of fire, and it is said he repeatedly summoned a Salamander from that realm to aid in the construction of this ring. Not being known for their patience, it is likely he should not have pestered his "instructor" quite so much. The finger bearing the finished ring was indeed untouched by the inferno that claimed his tower. Had that finger still been attached, Batalista himself might have fared better.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Fire Resistance: +50%

Weight: 0
Batalista's Passport
The grand mage Batalista intended this item to aid in his travels in the plane of fire, and it is said he repeatedly summoned a Salamander from that realm to aid in the construction of this ring. Not being known for their patience, it is likely he should not have pestered his "instructor" quite so much. The finger bearing the finished ring was indeed untouched by the inferno that claimed his tower. Had that finger still been attached, Batalista himself might have fared better.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Résistance au feu : +50 %

Poids : 0
RING03
Band of the Forest
Druid's Ring
This slender band of green metal has a strange, organic warmth to it—more like a vine than a circle of steel. A druid order in Cormanthor is said to cautiously guard the secret to the construction of these rings, which have never been seen in the possession of anyone outside their immediate membership. How this particular ring escaped the protection of their forest is unknown, but there are rumors that an outcast could have brought it into exile with him.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Spell Memorization: divine spellcasters can memorize one extra spell of each level from 1st to 4th

Weight: 0
Druid's Ring
This slender band of green metal has a strange, organic warmth to it—more like a vine than a circle of steel. A druid order in Cormanthor is said to cautiously guard the secret to the construction of these rings, which have never been seen in the possession of anyone outside their immediate membership. How this particular ring escaped the protection of their forest is unknown, but there are rumors that an outcast could have brought it into exile with him.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Mémorisation d'un sort divin supplémentaire de niveau 1, 2, 3 et 4

Poids : 0
RING04
Ring of Clumsiness
The Jester's Folly
The most notorious owner of this ring made a substantial living exploiting its cursed nature. Gregoria the Foole, a jester by trade, would use his incomparable sleight of hand to switch this ring with that of a patsy taken from his audience. The rest of his performance would involve the mocking of the newly clumsy individual, much to the delight of their comrades. The ring was removed (by a method known only to the wily jester) only once the stooge had promised no reprisals for the treatment he had received; though Gregoria frequently still had to make a hasty retreat. His last known performance was rumored to have been an ill-humored mage in Zhentil Keep; a show from which he did not flee quite fast enough.

STATISTICS:

*CURSED*

Equipped abilities:
– Armor Class: -2
– THAC0: -2
– Casting Speed: -1

Weight: 0
The Jester's Folly
The most notorious owner of this ring made a substantial living exploiting its cursed nature. Gregoria the Foole, a jester by trade, would use his incomparable sleight of hand to switch this ring with that of a patsy taken from his audience. The rest of his performance would involve the mocking of the newly clumsy individual, much to the delight of their comrades. The ring was removed (by a method known only to the wily jester) only once the stooge had promised no reprisals for the treatment he had received; though Gregoria frequently still had to make a hasty retreat. His last known performance was rumored to have been an ill-humored mage in Zhentil Keep; a show from which he did not flee quite fast enough.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Maudit : Ne peut être ôté qu'à l'aide d'un sort de Délivrance de la malédiction
- Classe d'armure : -2
- TAC0 : -2
- Vitesse d'incantation : -1

Poids : 0
RING05
Ring of Invisibility
Sandthief's Ring
Held by a master thief for the better part of a generation, this ring was put to bold use in the markets of Waterdeep. Working a crowd in broad daylight, the rogue would steal countless numbers of purses from nobles, replacing them with bags of sand so the theft would go unnoticed. His identity was never known, but the name "Sandthief" was cursed loudly in its stead. It is rumored he retired, and now lives among the nobles he used to rob.

STATISTICS:

Special abilities:
– Invisibility (three times per day): 5 turns

Weight: 0
Sandthief's Ring
Held by a master thief for the better part of a generation, this ring was put to bold use in the markets of Waterdeep. Working a crowd in broad daylight, the rogue would steal countless numbers of purses from nobles, replacing them with bags of sand so the theft would go unnoticed. His identity was never known, but the name "Sandthief" was cursed loudly in its stead. It is rumored he retired, and now lives among the nobles he used to rob.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités de charge : 
- Invisibility (3 fois par jour)

Poids : 0
RING06
Ring of Protection +1
Amulets, cloaks, and rings of this sort are infused with protective spells, and are among the most popular and numerous magic items on the market. The original design may have originated in the earliest of arcane guilds, but the current makers of these items are varied and widespread. Unfortunately, multiple protective enchantments of these kind don't stack, and thus no other amulet, cloak, or ring of protection can be worn while wearing this ring.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Armor Class: +1
– Saving Throws: +1

Weight: 0
Amulets, cloaks, and rings of this sort are infused with protective spells, and are among the most popular and numerous magic items on the market. The original design may have originated in the earliest of arcane guilds, but the current makers of these items are varied and widespread. Unfortunately, multiple protective enchantments of these kind don't stack, and thus no other amulet, cloak, or ring of protection can be worn while wearing this ring.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Classe d'armure : +1
- Jets de sauvegarde : +1

Poids : 0
RING07
Ring of Protection +2
The Guard's Ring
The Guard was an immortal sentry assigned to protect a tomb that sheltered the body of a princess of the Akanal. Over millennia, respect for the grave disappeared with the memory of the royal family, and adventurers began to try their luck with the Guard. It was inevitable that he would eventually be bested, and when he was, the ring he wore was one of many treasures taken from the tomb.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Armor Class: +2
– Saving Throws: +2

Weight: 0
The Guard's Ring
The Guard was an immortal sentry assigned to protect a tomb that sheltered the body of a princess of the Akanal. Over millennia, respect for the grave disappeared with the memory of the royal family, and adventurers began to try their luck with the Guard. It was inevitable that he would eventually be bested, and when he was, the ring he wore was one of many treasures taken from the tomb.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Classe d'armure : +2
- Jets de sauvegarde : +2

Poids : 0
RING08
Ring of Wizardry
Reaching Ring
This ring is masterfully enchanted, allowing the wearer to memorize more spells than normally possible.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Spell Memorization: arcane spellcasters can memorize one extra spell of each level from 1st to 4th

Weight: 0

Poids : 0
RING09
Ring of Free Action
Edventar's Gift
This ring was given to the reef scavenger and hunter known only as Edventar by a group of aquatic elves long his friends. His help in routing the "Pirate Queen" Yenandra of Dambrath was instrumental in their survival, though Yenandra continues to be feared anywhere the water meets land.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Spell: Free Action

Weight: 0
Edventar's Gift
This ring was given to the reef scavenger and hunter known only as Edventar by a group of aquatic elves long his friends. His help in routing the "Pirate Queen" Yenandra of Dambrath was instrumental in their survival, though Yenandra continues to be feared anywhere the water meets land.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Immunité au sort Lenteur du Golem
- Immunité au sort Sphère résistante d'Otiluke
- Immunité au sort Lent
- Immunité au sort Toile d'araignée
- Immunité au sort Enchevêtrement
- Immunité au sort Glisse
- Immunité aux toiles
- Immunité à la lenteur
- Immunité à la paralysie
- Immunité aux effets affectant la vitesse de déplacement
- Action libre

Poids : 0
RING10
Anneau d'or
Un anneau est une fine lanière de métal précieux. Il sert en général d'ornement. Plus rarement, certains sont enchantés et permettent à quiconque les porte d'user de la magie qu'ils contiennent. Ils sont de ce fait très recherchés par les aventuriers.

PARAMÈTRES :

Poids : 0
Un anneau est une fine lanière de métal précieux. Il sert en général d'ornement. Plus rarement, certains sont enchantés et permettent à quiconque les porte d'user de la magie qu'ils contiennent. Ils sont de ce fait très recherchés par les aventuriers.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Poids : 0
RING11
Anneau d'argent
Un anneau est une fine lanière de métal précieux. Il sert en général d'ornement. Plus rarement, certains sont enchantés et permettent à quiconque les porte d'user de la magie qu'ils contiennent. Ils sont de ce fait très recherchés par les aventuriers.

Poids : 0
RING20
Ring of Energy
The Victor
Crafted by drow mages of the Underdark, this weapon was used in an arranged battle between two rival houses. Each combatant was allowed to use a single magic item to aid his efforts. This ring was the weapon used by the victor of the contest, though he never laid hands on it. It was worn by his sibling and fired from the crowd, striking his opponent squarely in the back. Everyone witnessing agreed it was a brilliant interpretation of the rules.

STATISTICS:

Special abilities:
– Energy Blast (once per day): deals 3d6 magic damage to one target

Equipped abilities:
– Magic Damage Resistance: +25%

Weight: 0
The Victor
Crafted by drow mages of the Underdark, this weapon was used in an arranged battle between two rival houses. Each combatant was allowed to use a single magic item to aid his efforts. This ring was the weapon used by the victor of the contest, though he never laid hands on it. It was worn by his sibling and fired from the crowd, striking his opponent squarely in the back. Everyone witnessing agreed it was a brilliant interpretation of the rules.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Résistance aux dégâts magiques : +25 %

Capacités de charge : 
- Inflige 3d6 points de dégâts magiques à la cible (1 fois par jour)

Poids : 0
RING21
Ring of Night's Embrace
This ring is as dark as the night sky. When donned, it grants its wearer the ability to see perfectly in the dark and blend easily into the shadows. Though a common item among rogues and others who wish to go unnoticed, this item is rapidly becoming standard equipment among the Night Masks, according to the Westgate city watch.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Hide in Shadows: +40%
– Spell: Infravision

Weight: 0
This ring is as dark as the night sky. When donned, it grants its wearer the ability to see perfectly in the dark and blend easily into the shadows. Though a common item among rogues and others who wish to go unnoticed, this item is rapidly becoming standard equipment among the Night Masks, according to the Westgate city watch.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Camouflage dans l'ombre : +40 %
- Infravision

Poids : 0
RING22
Ring of Holiness
Every God Ring
Rings such as these are one of the most well kept secrets among the pious. For in order for these rings to be created, they must be blessed by all the known gods. This can cause problems, especially for those faiths that conflict with each other. It's not surprising that those who choose to don the ring refuse to reveal its origins for fear of being persecuted by their own brethren.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Spell Memorization: divine spellcasters can memorize one extra spell of each level from 1st to 4th

Weight: 0
Every God Ring
Rings such as these are one of the most well kept secrets among the pious. For in order for these rings to be created, they must be blessed by all the known gods. This can cause problems, especially for those faiths that conflict with each other. It's not surprising that those who choose to don the ring refuse to reveal its origins for fear of being persecuted by their own brethren.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Mémorisation d'un sort divin supplémentaire de niveau 1, 2, 3 et 4

Poids : 0
RING23
Ring of Folly
Discipliner
Oft the bane of the careless mage, this ring was actually used to promote humility. Hergat Norin, a grand wizard of Narfell, would give the Discipliner to his most skilled, and most egotistical, students. Through their blind arrogance, they would mistake the ring as a reward for their "obvious brilliance", and not the punishment of a disapproving teacher.

STATISTICS:

*CURSED*

Equipped abilities:
– Casting Speed: +1
– Wild Magic: any spell cast by the wearer is affected by wild surges

Weight: 0
Discipliner
Oft the bane of the careless mage, this ring was actually used to promote humility. Hergat Norin, a grand wizard of Narfell, would give the Discipliner to his most skilled, and most egotistical, students. Through their blind arrogance, they would mistake the ring as a reward for their "obvious brilliance", and not the punishment of a disapproving teacher.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Maudit : Ne peut être ôté qu'à l'aide d'un sort de Délivrance de la malédiction
- Vitesse d'incantation : +1
- Les sorts lancés par le porteur déclenchent un hiatus entropique

Poids : 0
RING25
Ring of Opportunity
This ring was given to  by Koveras in Candlekeep. Its polished black surface is cold to the touch and engraved with powerful incantations. The ring's design and crafting material suggest western workmanship. On the inside, you see what appears to be a thick figure eight with a slash mark through it.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Luck: +1 (+5% for skills)

Weight: 0
This ring was given to  by Koveras in Candlekeep. Its polished black surface is cold to the touch and engraved with powerful incantations. The ring's design and crafting material suggest western workmanship. On the inside, you see what appears to be a thick figure eight with a slash mark through it.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Jets de sauvegarde : +1
- Chance : +1
- Compétences de voleur : +5 %

Poids : 0
RING26
Ring of Djinni Summoning
An item out of fables, the Ring of Djinni Summoning is highly sought after. Once a day, the wearer of this beautiful ring can summon a djinni who will perform a Limited Wish as desired.

STATISTICS:

Special abilities:
– Limited Wish (once per day)

Weight: 0
An item out of fables, the Ring of Djinni Summoning is highly sought after. Once a day, the wearer of this beautiful ring can summon a djinni who will perform a Limited Wish as desired.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités de charge : 
- Limited Wish (1 fois par jour)

Poids : 0
RING27
Ring of Fire Control
This burnished red ring is engraved with depictions of flames and lava coils. Mages and other planar travelers use these rings to protect themselves while visiting the Elemental Plane of Fire and to command fire elementals to do their bidding.

STATISTICS:

Special abilities:
– Fire Shield (once per day): 1 turn
– Conjure Lesser Fire Elemental (once per day): 1 turn

Equipped abilities:
– Fire Resistance: +50%

Weight: 0
This burnished red ring is engraved with depictions of flames and lava coils. Mages and other planar travelers use these rings to protect themselves while visiting the Elemental Plane of Fire and to command fire elementals to do their bidding.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Résistance au feu : +50 %

Capacités de charge : 
- Fire Shield (1 fois par jour)
- Conjure Lesser Fire Elemental (1 fois par jour)

Poids : 0
RING28
Ring of Air Control
Air elementals make for powerful foes, but with this ring, they can become valuable allies. Dark tales tell of groups of Red Wizards all with rings of elemental command descending upon small villages with no warning and destroying every living thing in sight. Although the truth of these rumors is questionable, the fact remains that a ring of this power in the wrong hands is dangerous.

STATISTICS:

Special abilities:
– Zone of Sweet Air (once per day)
– Conjure Lesser Air Elemental (once per day): 1 turn

Equipped abilities:
– Spell Immunity: Stinking Cloud, Cloudkill, Acid Fog, and Incendiary Cloud

Weight: 0
Air elementals make for powerful foes, but with this ring, they can become valuable allies. Dark tales tell of groups of Red Wizards all with rings of elemental command descending upon small villages with no warning and destroying every living thing in sight. Although the truth of these rumors is questionable, the fact remains that a ring of this power in the wrong hands is dangerous.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Immunité au sort Cloudkill
- Immunité au sort Nuage incendiaire
- Immunité au sort Brume mortelle
- Immunité au sort Nuage mortel
- Immunité au sort Nuage puant

Capacités de charge : 
- Zone of Sweet Air (1 fois par jour)
- Conjure Lesser Air Elemental (1 fois par jour)

Poids : 0
RING29
Ring of Earth Control
If the songs of bards are correct, all one must do is wear this ring and they will gain the ability to control earth elementals at will. Of course, earth elementals are not easily controlled and care must be taken when commanding one. An angry earth elemental can make short work of an inept adventurer.

STATISTICS:

Special abilities:
– Stoneskin (once per day): 5 turns
– Conjure Lesser Earth Elemental (once per day): 1 turn

Equipped abilities:
– Armor Class: +2

Weight: 0
If the songs of bards are correct, all one must do is wear this ring and they will gain the ability to control earth elementals at will. Of course, earth elementals are not easily controlled and care must be taken when commanding one. An angry earth elemental can make short work of an inept adventurer.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Classe d'armure : +2

Capacités de charge : 
- Stoneskin (1 fois par jour)
- Conjure Lesser Earth Elemental (1 fois par jour)

Poids : 0
RING30
Ring of Human Influence
For seven years Count Fisfnilt searched the Realms for a suitable bride for his son Ewnin. Unfortunately, all the women that Fisfnilt found were not up to the standards set by Ewnin, an impossibly spoiled man. Desiring an heir and impatient with his son, the Count had the court mage fashion this ring. He gifted the ring to a woman of no small courtly influence and Ewnin was instantly smitten. They wed three weeks later.

STATISTICS:

Special abilities:
– Charm Person (once per day)

Equipped abilities:
– Charisma: +2
– Human Influence: +2 to Armor Class and Saving Throws vs. humans

Weight: 0
For seven years Count Fisfnilt searched the Realms for a suitable bride for his son Ewnin. Unfortunately, all the women that Fisfnilt found were not up to the standards set by Ewnin, an impossibly spoiled man. Desiring an heir and impatient with his son, the Count had the court mage fashion this ring. He gifted the ring to a woman of no small courtly influence and Ewnin was instantly smitten. They wed three weeks later.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Classe d'armure : +2 contre les humains
- Jets de sauvegarde : +2 contre les humains
- Charisme : +2

Capacités de charge : 
- Charm Person (1 fois par jour)

Poids : 0
RING31
Ring of Regeneration
A lowly ranked Red Mage named Huhhus is said to have discovered the perfect way to distill troll flesh to make a potion that provided the same regenerative ability as that of the troll. Few were willing to drink the vile liquid however, and decades later, a student of Huhhus created this ring, building upon the foundations of knowledge laid by Huhhus. Within the hollow cavity of the jade ring floats the ichor and brains of a troll, providing a limited regenerative capability to the wearer.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Regeneration: 1 HP/round

Weight: 0
A lowly ranked Red Mage named Huhhus is said to have discovered the perfect way to distill troll flesh to make a potion that provided the same regenerative ability as that of the troll. Few were willing to drink the vile liquid however, and decades later, a student of Huhhus created this ring, building upon the foundations of knowledge laid by Huhhus. Within the hollow cavity of the jade ring floats the ichor and brains of a troll, providing a limited regenerative capability to the wearer.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Régénère 1 point de vie toutes les 6 secondes

Poids : 0
RING32


Capacités d'équipement : 
- Régénère 1 point de vie toutes les 20 secondes

Poids : 0
RING33
Ring of the Ram
Also known as the Breaker of Castles, with one word this ring can unleash fantastic and deadly powers. When it is triggered, a barely discernible ram-like shape billows forth from the ring. This force can potentially knock opponents off of walls, destroy castle gates, or crush enemies, but it is damaging as well, in its own right.

STATISTICS:

Special abilities:
– Battering Ram (three times per day)

Combat Abilities (monks only):
– Knockdown: 33% chance creatures struck by the wearer in melee are knocked unconscious for 1 round (save vs. Death negates)

Weight: 0
Also known as the Breaker of Castles, with one word this ring can unleash fantastic and deadly powers. When it is triggered, a barely discernible ram-like shape billows forth from the ring. This force can potentially knock opponents off of walls, destroy castle gates, or crush enemies, but it is damaging as well, in its own right.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités de charge : 
- Battering Ram (3 fois par jour)

Poids : 0
RING34
Ring of Spell Turning
A gift to Derek Poodon, apprentice warrior, this ring was his salvation when he stumbled upon two Red Wizards traveling the Cloakwood Forest. Enraged at being disturbed, the mages unleashed a score of Magic Missiles at the seemingly helpless Derek, but to their brief surprise, the assault reflected back and killed them both. Thereafter, without having lifted his blade, Derek was rather sheepishly known as Derek the Red Slayer.

STATISTICS:

Special abilities:
– Spell Turning (once per day): 5 turns

Equipped abilities:
– Magic Resistance: +10%

Weight: 0
A gift to Derek Poodon, apprentice warrior, this ring was his salvation when he stumbled upon two Red Wizards traveling the Cloakwood Forest. Enraged at being disturbed, the mages unleashed a score of Magic Missiles at the seemingly helpless Derek, but to their brief surprise, the assault reflected back and killed them both. Thereafter, without having lifted his blade, Derek was rather sheepishly known as Derek the Red Slayer.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Résistance à la magie : +10 %

Capacités de charge : 
- Spell Turning (1 fois par jour)

Poids : 0
RING35
Ring of the Burglar
Derek Drak, one of the most talented burglars in the Shadow Thieves' guild, wore this ring on many of his scores. The ring enhanced Derek's already impressive lock picking abilities. In the city of Athkatla, there wasn't a door that could not be unlocked by Derek. To activate the ring, the proper command word must be known, at which point the garnet stone on the ring will polymorph into the shape of a key that closely fits the lock.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Dexterity: +1
– Open Locks: +20%

Weight: 0
Derek Drak, one of the most talented burglars in the Shadow Thieves' guild, wore this ring on many of his scores. The ring enhanced Derek's already impressive lock picking abilities. In the city of Athkatla, there wasn't a door that could not be unlocked by Derek. To activate the ring, the proper command word must be known, at which point the garnet stone on the ring will polymorph into the shape of a key that closely fits the lock.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Dextérité : +1
- Crochetage de serrures : +20 %

Poids : 0
RING36
Ring of Danger Sense
Nizzuf's Maze was a grand hedge maze created by the archmage Nizzuf for his amusement. The maze boasted hundreds of magical traps, most of them extremely lethal. Nizzuf posted a reward big enough to buy a kingdom for the man or woman brave enough to enter the maze and reach its core. Thousands tried and died. But one, Oteg Verm, completed the maze, thanks mainly to this ring which let him "see" where the traps were hidden.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Save vs. Breath: +3
– Find Traps: +20%
– Protects Against: Backstabs

Weight: 0
Nizzuf's Maze was a grand hedge maze created by the archmage Nizzuf for his amusement. The maze boasted hundreds of magical traps, most of them extremely lethal. Nizzuf posted a reward big enough to buy a kingdom for the man or woman brave enough to enter the maze and reach its core. Thousands tried and died. But one, Oteg Verm, completed the maze, thanks mainly to this ring which let him "see" where the traps were hidden.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Jets de sauvegarde : +3 contre les souffles
- Détection/désamorçage des pièges : +20 %
- Immunité aux attaques sournoises

Poids : 0
RING37
Storm Ring
This ring is worn by followers of the Storm Lord Talos, whose disciples await their god's wrath and welcome it eagerly. The ability to wreak havoc and ruin are the principle ideals that Talos desires to see in his subjects.

STATISTICS:

Weight: 0

PARAMÈTRES : 

Poids : 0
RING38
Dawn Ring
These rings are often found in possession of those who worship Lathander the Morninglord. Lathander espouses the principles of creativity and prosperity and believes that pride is a sinful trait that requires smothering.

STATISTICS:

Weight: 0
These rings are often found in possession of those who worship Lathander the Morninglord. Lathander espouses the principles of creativity and prosperity and believes that pride is a sinful trait that requires smothering.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Poids : 0
RING39
Ring of Gaxx
This ring is relatively unadorned, but the vile magic within radiates intense evil. Indeed, its creator, Kangaxx, was no less evil himself, even before millennia of undeath honed his power. It is said that a cadre of Netheril mages fought and imprisoned the demilich once, but being unable to truly destroy him they became liches themselves to stand guard over his remains. The construction of the ring may have led to their enmity, as each of the gem's nine facets was supposedly empowered by sacrifice and death.

STATISTICS:

Special abilities:
– Energy Drain (once per day)

Equipped abilities:
– Armor Class: +2
– Saving Throws: +2
– Regeneration: 1 HP/round
– Protects Against: Disease and Poison

Weight: 0
This ring is relatively unadorned, but the vile magic within radiates intense evil. Indeed, its creator, Kangaxx, was no less evil himself, even before millennia of undeath honed his power. It is said that a cadre of Netheril mages fought and imprisoned the demilich once, but being unable to truly destroy him they became liches themselves to stand guard over his remains. The construction of the ring may have led to their enmity, as each of the gem's nine facets was supposedly empowered by sacrifice and death.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Classe d'armure : +2
- Jets de sauvegarde : +2
- Régénère 1 point de vie toutes les 6 secondes
- Résistance aux poisons : +100 %
- Immunité au sort Nuage mortel
- Immunité au sort Poison
- Immunité aux poisons
- Immunité à la maladie

Capacités de charge : 
- Energy Drain (1 fois par jour)

Poids : 0
RING40
Ring of Acuity
The origins of this ring are unclear, and while its enchantments share similarities with historical examples of Rings of Wizardry, there is something strange in how it feels, either in the weight of the metal or in the aura it projects, and it does not function the same. It was likely found on some distant plane, and as such, its maker will remain a mystery to you.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Spell Memorization: arcane spellcasters can memorize one extra spell of each level from 5th to 7th

Weight: 0
The origins of this ring are unclear, and while its enchantments share similarities with historical examples of Rings of Wizardry, there is something strange in how it feels, either in the weight of the metal or in the aura it projects, and it does not function the same. It was likely found on some distant plane, and as such, its maker will remain a mystery to you.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Mémorisation d'un sort profane supplémentaire de niveau 5, 6 et 7

Poids : 0
RING41
Ring of Protection +3
The Warder's Signet
Legend holds that this plain gold band was a gift from Ao to Helm as a reward for the God's stalwart service during the Time of Troubles. Helm, in turn, diluted and divided the ring and passed the gift on to his mortal followers. Scholars outside the church argue that Ao seems above emotion or gratitude, and chalk the story up to propaganda for the faithful.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Armor Class: +3
– Saving Throws: +3

Weight: 0
The Warder's Signet
Legend holds that this plain gold band was a gift from Ao to Helm as a reward for the God's stalwart service during the Time of Troubles. Helm, in turn, diluted and divided the ring and passed the gift on to his mortal followers. Scholars outside the church argue that Ao seems above emotion or gratitude, and chalk the story up to propaganda for the faithful.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Classe d'armure : +3
- Jets de sauvegarde : +3

Poids : 0
RING42
Ring of the Wraith
The Specter's Ring
A ruthless assassin of Tethyr known only as the Specter used this ring to great effect many years ago. Striking completely unseen, his victims' demises were often attributed to angry ghosts and spirits. The wearer of this ring assumes a dark incorporeal form like that of a wraith, gaining many of its characteristics as well.

STATISTICS:

Special abilities:
– Improved Invisibility (once per day): 1 turn

Equipped abilities:
– Wraith Form: the wearer moves silently and cannot be backstabbed, is vulnerable only to magical weapons or attacks, and is immune to spells and abilities that don't affect incorporeal creatures

Weight: 0
The Specter's Ring
A ruthless assassin of Tethyr known only as the Specter used this ring to great effect many years ago. Striking completely unseen, his victims' demises were often attributed to angry ghosts and spirits. The wearer of this ring assumes a dark incorporeal form like that of a wraith, gaining many of its characteristics as well.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Furtivité : +100 %
- Résistance aux poisons : +100 %
- Immunité au sort Nuage mortel
- Immunité au sort Poison
- Immunité au sort Désintégration
- Immunité au sort Pétrification
- Immunité au sort Métamorphose d'autrui
- Immunité au sort Toile d'araignée
- Immunité au sort Glisse
- Immunité au sort Implosion
- Immunité au sort Tremblement de terre
- Immunité au sort Enchevêtrement
- Immunité aux poisons
- Immunité à la pétrification
- Immunité à la désintégration
- Immunité à la maladie
- Immunité contre les armes non-magiques
- 1 % de chance d'immuniser le porteur au sort Changement de forme
- 1 % de chance d'immuniser le porteur au sort Métamorphose
- 1 % de chance de résister aux attaques sournoises

Capacités de charge : 
- Improved Invisibility (1 fois par jour)

Poids : 0

– Elemental Resistance: +15%

– Elemental Resistance: +25%
– Spell Memorization: divine spellcasters can memorize one extra spell of each level from 5th to 7th

RING46
Ring of Larloch
Soul Stealer
Larloch, the infamous necromancer turned lich, had an insatiable need for new souls for his research. The means he used to tear them from their living bodies and capture them are as myriad as they are terrifying. The uninitiated dabble with Larloch's artifacts at their own peril.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Maximum Hit Points: +10

Combat abilities:
– Vampiric: creatures struck by the wearer in melee are drained 1d4 Hit Points and transfer them to the wearer

Weight: 0
Soul Stealer
Larloch, the infamous necromancer turned lich, had an insatiable need for new souls for his research. The means he used to tear them from their living bodies and capture them are as myriad as they are terrifying. The uninitiated dabble with Larloch's artifacts at their own peril.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Points de vie maximum : +10
- À chaque attaque de mêlée réussie: Draine 1d4 points de vie si la cible possède du sang et les transfère au porteur

Poids : 0
RING47
Iron Thorn Ring
Cursed Ring of Slight Monsterism
This wrought-iron band is pitted and stained as if by acid. Between the two thorns formed by the band, a crude lump of silver on its head suggests the image of a skull against a black field, perhaps the symbol of Myrkul, Lord of Bones.

STATISTICS:

*CURSED*

Equipped abilities:
– Protects Against: Poison
– Zombification: wearer's appearance is set to that of a zombie
– Charisma: -4

Weight: 0
Cursed Ring of Slight Monsterism
This wrought-iron band is pitted and stained as if by acid. Between the two thorns formed by the band, a crude lump of silver on its head suggests the image of a skull against a black field, perhaps the symbol of Myrkul, Lord of Bones.

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Maudit : Ne peut être ôté qu'à l'aide d'un sort de Délivrance de la malédiction
- Charisme : -4
- Résistance aux poisons : +100 %
- Immunité au sort Nuage mortel
- Immunité au sort Poison

RINGPICO
Anneau de Contrôle de la Terre
Si les récits des bardes sont vrais, il suffit de passer cet anneau pour commander à volonté tous les élémentaires de terre. Bien sûr les élémentaires de terre ne se contrôlent pas si facilement et il vaut mieux faire cela avec soin. Un élémentaire de terre en colère peut aisément réduire en bouillie un aventurier malhabile.

PARAMÈTRES :

Capacités d'équipement :
- Classe d'armure : +1

Capacités de charge :
- Charmer élémentaire de terre une fois par jour (jet de sauvegarde contre les sorts +2 pour annuler)
  Portée : contact
  Durée : 45 secondes
  Zone d'effet : 1 élémentaire de terre

- Transmutation de la pierre en chair une fois par jour
  Portée : contact
  Zone d'effet : 1 créature

Poids : 0
Si les récits des bardes sont vrais, il suffit de passer cet anneau pour commander à volonté tous les élémentaires de terre. Bien sûr les élémentaires de terre ne se contrôlent pas si facilement et il vaut mieux faire cela avec soin. Un élémentaire de terre en colère peut aisément réduire en bouillie un aventurier malhabile.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Poids : 0
RINGWOLF


Capacités d'équipement : 
- Régénère 6 points de vie par seconde

Poids : 0
RODAXE
Rod of Lordly Might +3
Also called the Wrath of Three Kings, though not associated with any named king in particular, this rod was likely made in 1090 DR. It saw use during the Battle of the Bones, but for which side is uncertain as it was found amongst the dead after a larger skirmish. Untransformed, the rod may serve as a powerful club with defensive enchantments, but its true power lies in the seven studlike buttons along its length that unlock the rod's magic. The first four of these buttons extend and transform the rod into alternative forms: a flail of disruption, a flaming long sword, a hypnotic axe, and a spear of speed. The final three buttons, rather than transforming the rod itself, instead activate powerful abilities: the first creates a ghastly spectre of the wielder, terrifying all those who see it; the second completely paralyzes another creature, rendering them helpess when pointed at; and lastly, the third directly sucks at the life of the target, healing the wielder of the rod.

The rod is currently transformed into a battle axe.

STATISTICS:

Special abilities:
– Terrify (once per day): opponents within 15 ft. of the wielder flee in terror for 1 turn (save vs. Rod at -2 negates)
– Paralyze (once per day): a target is paralyzed for 5 rounds (save vs. Rod at -2 negates)
– Drain Life (once per day): target is drained 30 Hit Points and transfers them to the wielder (save vs. Rod at -2 for half)

Combat abilities:
– Confusing: 33% chance target is confused for 2 rounds (save vs. Spell negates)
– Sleeping: 33% chance target will fall asleep for 2 rounds (save vs. Spell negates)
– Stunning: 33% chance target is stunned for 1 round (save vs. Spell negates)

THAC0: +3
Damage: 2d4+3 (slashing)
Speed Factor: 6
Proficiency Type: Axe
Type: One-handed
Requires:
 10 Strength
 9 Intelligence

Weight: 10
Also called the Wrath of Three Kings, though not associated with any named king in particular, this rod was likely made in 1090 DR. It saw use during the Battle of the Bones, but for which side is uncertain as it was found amongst the dead after a larger skirmish. Untransformed, the rod may serve as a powerful club with defensive enchantments, but its true power lies in the seven studlike buttons along its length that unlock the rod's magic. The first four of these buttons extend and transform the rod into alternative forms: a flail of disruption, a flaming long sword, a hypnotic axe, and a spear of speed. The final three buttons, rather than transforming the rod itself, instead activate powerful abilities: the first creates a ghastly spectre of the wielder, terrifying all those who see it; the second completely paralyzes another creature, rendering them helpess when pointed at; and lastly, the third directly sucks at the life of the target, healing the wielder of the rod.

The rod is currently transformed into a battle axe.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- TAC0 de la main secondaire : -1
- Multiplicateur d'attaque sournoise : -2

Capacités de combat : 
- 33 % de chance d'endormir la cible pendant 2 rounds (jet de sauvegarde contre les sorts pour éviter)

Enchantement : +3
TAC0 : +3
Dégâts : 2d4 +3
Type de dégâts : Tranchant (Rod)
Facteur de vitesse : 6
Type de compétence : Hache
Type : Arme à 1 main

Poids : 10

Nécessite : 
- Force : 10
- Intelligence : 9
RODMACE
Rod of Lordly Might +3
Also called the Wrath of Three Kings, though not associated with any named king in particular, this rod was likely made in 1090 DR. It saw use during the Battle of the Bones, but for which side is uncertain as it was found amongst the dead after a larger skirmish. Untransformed, the rod may serve as a powerful club with defensive enchantments, but its true power lies in the seven studlike buttons along its length that unlock the rod's magic. The first four of these buttons extend and transform the rod into alternative forms: a flail of disruption, a flaming long sword, a hypnotic axe, and a spear of speed. The final three buttons, rather than transforming the rod itself, instead activate powerful abilities: the first creates a ghastly spectre of the wielder, terrifying all those who see it; the second completely paralyzes another creature, rendering them helpess when pointed at; and lastly, the third directly sucks at the life of the target, healing the wielder of the rod.

The rod is currently transformed into a flail.

STATISTICS:

Special abilities:
– Terrify (once per day): opponents within 15 ft. of the wielder flee in terror for 1 turn (save vs. Rod at -2 negates)
– Paralyze (once per day): a target is paralyzed for 5 rounds (save vs. Rod at -2 negates)
– Drain Life (once per day): target is drained 30 Hit Points and transfers them to the wielder (save vs. Rod at -2 for half)

Combat abilities:
– Disruption: undead creatures are destroyed (save vs. Spell negates)

THAC0: +3
Damage: 2d4+3 (crushing and piercing)
Speed Factor: 8
Proficiency Type: Flail
Type: One-handed
Requires:
 13 Strength
 9 Intelligence

Weight: 10
Also called the Wrath of Three Kings, though not associated with any named king in particular, this rod was likely made in 1090 DR. It saw use during the Battle of the Bones, but for which side is uncertain as it was found amongst the dead after a larger skirmish. Untransformed, the rod may serve as a powerful club with defensive enchantments, but its true power lies in the seven studlike buttons along its length that unlock the rod's magic. The first four of these buttons extend and transform the rod into alternative forms: a flail of disruption, a flaming long sword, a hypnotic axe, and a spear of speed. The final three buttons, rather than transforming the rod itself, instead activate powerful abilities: the first creates a ghastly spectre of the wielder, terrifying all those who see it; the second completely paralyzes another creature, rendering them helpess when pointed at; and lastly, the third directly sucks at the life of the target, healing the wielder of the rod.

The rod is currently transformed into a flail.

Type : Arme à 1 main

- Intelligence : 9
RODS02
Rod of Lordly Might +3

RODS04
Rod of Smiting +4
Rods of Smiting are extremely uncommon weapons, though they can be very useful against some foes. This particular rod was last in the possession of a priest of Gond named Debian of Urmlaspyr. Debian was an eccentric adventurer, who took it upon himself to investigate every type of golem that had been reported in the realms. In many cases, the creator of the golem would send his or her creations after Debian for his snooping. Debian usually escaped without much personal harm. Unfortunately for Debian, his luck ran out when he investigated the lair of the Machinery Man, a bizarre lich who happened to be the creator of golems and other animated constructs. The Machinery Man's lab full of iron golems proved to be too much for Debian to overcome.

NOTE: Rod of Smiting is always considered to be of +4 enchantment when determining what it can hit.

STATISTICS:

Combat abilities:
– Golem Bane: +3 to THAC0 and +5 to damage against golems
– Shattering: golems are destroyed (save vs. Rod negates)

THAC0: +2
Damage: 1d6+2 (crushing)
Speed Factor: 4
Proficiency Type: Club
Type: One-handed
Requires:
 5 Strength

Weight: 3
Rods of Smiting are extremely uncommon weapons, though they can be very useful against some foes. This particular rod was last in the possession of a priest of Gond named Debian of Urmlaspyr. Debian was an eccentric adventurer, who took it upon himself to investigate every type of golem that had been reported in the realms. In many cases, the creator of the golem would send his or her creations after Debian for his snooping. Debian usually escaped without much personal harm. Unfortunately for Debian, his luck ran out when he investigated the lair of the Machinery Man, a bizarre lich who happened to be the creator of golems and other animated constructs. The Machinery Man's lab full of iron golems proved to be too much for Debian to overcome.

NOTE: Rod of Smiting is always considered to be of +4 enchantment when determining what it can hit.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- TAC0 : +3 contre les golems
- Inflige 5 points de dégâts contre les golems
- Multiplicateur d'attaque sournoise : -2

Capacités de combat : 
- Tue instantanément les golems (jet de sauvegarde contre la pétrification et la métamorphose pour éviter)

Enchantement : +4
TAC0 : +2
Dégâts : 1d6 +2
Type de dégâts : Contondant
Facteur de vitesse : 4
Type de compétence : Gourdin
Type : Arme à 1 main

Poids : 3

Nécessite : 
- Force : 5
RODS05
Rod of Terror +3
These twisted rods emanate an aura of evil even while inactive, and fill all who gaze upon them with unease. They are capable of projecting a wave of unspeakable horror upon a single foe, filling even the hardiest soul with acute dread, and were certainly created for nefarious use.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Charisma: -1

Combat abilities:
– Horrifying: target flees in terror for 2 rounds (save vs. Spell negates)

THAC0: +3
Damage: 1d6+3 (crushing)
Speed Factor: 4
Proficiency Type: Club
Type: One-handed
Requires:
 5 Strength

Weight: 3
These twisted rods emanate an aura of evil even while inactive, and fill all who gaze upon them with unease. They are capable of projecting a wave of unspeakable horror upon a single foe, filling even the hardiest soul with acute dread, and were certainly created for nefarious use.

- Charisme : -1
- Multiplicateur d'attaque sournoise : -2

Capacités de combat : 
- Inflige Horreur à la cible pendant 2 rounds (jet de sauvegarde contre les sorts pour éviter)

Enchantement : +3
TAC0 : +3
Dégâts : 1d6 +3

Facteur de vitesse : 4

RODSPEAR
Rod of Lordly Might +3
Also called the Wrath of Three Kings, though not associated with any named king in particular, this rod was likely made in 1090 DR. It saw use during the Battle of the Bones, but for which side is uncertain as it was found amongst the dead after a larger skirmish. Untransformed, the rod may serve as a powerful club with defensive enchantments, but its true power lies in the seven studlike buttons along its length that unlock the rod's magic. The first four of these buttons extend and transform the rod into alternative forms: a flail of disruption, a flaming long sword, a hypnotic axe, and a spear of speed. The final three buttons, rather than transforming the rod itself, instead activate powerful abilities: the first creates a ghastly spectre of the wielder, terrifying all those who see it; the second completely paralyzes another creature, rendering them helpess when pointed at; and lastly, the third directly sucks at the life of the target, healing the wielder of the rod.

The rod is currently transformed into a spear.

STATISTICS:

Special abilities:
– Terrify (once per day): opponents within 15 ft. of the wielder flee in terror for 1 turn (save vs. Rod at -2 negates)
– Paralyze (once per day): a target is paralyzed for 5 rounds (save vs. Rod at -2 negates)
– Drain Life (once per day): target is drained 30 Hit Points and transfers them to the wielder (save vs. Rod at -2 for half)

Combat abilities:
– Returning: returns to the wielder's hand instantly after an attack is made
– Speed: 1 extra attack per round

THAC0: +3
Damage: 1d8+3
Damage Type (melee): Piercing
Damage Type (thrown): Missile
Speed Factor: 6
Proficiency Type: Spear
Type: Two-handed
Requires:
 5 Strength
 9 Intelligence

Weight: 10
Also called the Wrath of Three Kings, though not associated with any named king in particular, this rod was likely made in 1090 DR. It saw use during the Battle of the Bones, but for which side is uncertain as it was found amongst the dead after a larger skirmish. Untransformed, the rod may serve as a powerful club with defensive enchantments, but its true power lies in the seven studlike buttons along its length that unlock the rod's magic. The first four of these buttons extend and transform the rod into alternative forms: a flail of disruption, a flaming long sword, a hypnotic axe, and a spear of speed. The final three buttons, rather than transforming the rod itself, instead activate powerful abilities: the first creates a ghastly spectre of the wielder, terrifying all those who see it; the second completely paralyzes another creature, rendering them helpess when pointed at; and lastly, the third directly sucks at the life of the target, healing the wielder of the rod.

The rod is currently transformed into a spear.

- Multiplicateur d'attaque sournoise : -3

Capacités de combat : 
- Revient dans la main du lanceur

Enchantement : +3
TAC0 : +3
Dégâts : 1d8 +3
Type de dégâts : Perforant (Melee)

Facteur de vitesse : 6
Type de compétence : Lance

- Force : 5
- Intelligence : 9
RODSWORD
Rod of Lordly Might +3
Also called the Wrath of Three Kings, though not associated with any named king in particular, this rod was likely made in 1090 DR. It saw use during the Battle of the Bones, but for which side is uncertain as it was found amongst the dead after a larger skirmish. Untransformed, the rod may serve as a powerful club with defensive enchantments, but its true power lies in the seven studlike buttons along its length that unlock the rod's magic. The first four of these buttons extend and transform the rod into alternative forms: a flail of disruption, a flaming long sword, a hypnotic axe, and a spear of speed. The final three buttons, rather than transforming the rod itself, instead activate powerful abilities: the first creates a ghastly spectre of the wielder, terrifying all those who see it; the second completely paralyzes another creature, rendering them helpess when pointed at; and lastly, the third directly sucks at the life of the target, healing the wielder of the rod.

 6 Strength

It saw use during the Battle of the Bones, but for which side is uncertain as it was found amongst the dead after a larger skirmish. The first four of these buttons extend and transform the rod into alternative forms: a flail of disruption, a flaming long sword, a hypnotic axe, and a spear of speed. The final three buttons, rather than transforming the rod itself, instead activate powerful abilities: the first creates a ghastly spectre of the wielder, terrifying all those who see it; the second completely paralyzes another creature, rendering them helpess when pointed at; and lastly, the third directly sucks at the life of the target, healing the wielder of the rod.

ROSSLAND
Anneau d'invisibilité
Anneau d'invisibilité : « Anneau du voleur des sables »
Entre les mains d'un maître voleur pendant une génération, cet anneau fut employé de manière audacieuse sur les marchés d'Eauprofonde. Traversant la foule en plein jour, le gredin dérobait un nombre incalculable de bourses aux nobles et les remplaçait par des sacs remplis de sable afin de camoufler ses larcins. Son identité demeura à jamais inconnue, mais le nom de « Voleur des sables » fut maudit à sa place. La rumeur prétend qu'il a pris sa retraite et qu'il vit aujourd'hui parmi les nobles qu'il volait.

PARAMÈTRES :

Capacités de charge :
- Invisibilité une fois par jour
  Durée : 12 heures
  Zone d'effet : lanceur

Poids : 0
Anneau d'invisibilité : « Anneau du voleur des sables »
Entre les mains d'un maître voleur pendant une génération, cet anneau fut employé de manière audacieuse sur les marchés d'Eauprofonde. Traversant la foule en plein jour, le gredin dérobait un nombre incalculable de bourses aux nobles et les remplaçait par des sacs remplis de sable afin de camoufler ses larcins. Son identité demeura à jamais inconnue, mais le nom de « Voleur des sables » fut maudit à sa place. La rumeur prétend qu'il a pris sa retraite et qu'il vit aujourd'hui parmi les nobles qu'il volait.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités de charge : 
- Invisibilité pendant 500 jours (100 fois par jour)

Poids : 0
ROSSRING
Anneau d'action libre
Anneau d'action libre : « Cadeau d'Edventar »
Cet anneau fut donné à Edventar, le chasseur et écumeur de récifs, par un groupe d'elfes aquatiques, ses amis de longue date. En aidant dans sa fuite Yenandra de Dambrath, la « Reine des Pirates », Edventar leur permit en effet de survivre. Mais Yenandra est toujours crainte le long de toutes les côtes.

PARAMÈTRES :

Capacités d'équipement :
- Le porteur est immunisé contre tout ce qui, magique ou non, pourrait affecter sa mobilité, y compris les sorts de rapidité et de ralentissement.

Poids : 0

SECRET05
Big Metal Unit +5
Found within a long forgotten pocket of our collected pantology, herein tales the lie of the Metal "Unit."

Gargantua was self-proclaimed lord of his immeasurable lower regions until his son, Pantagruel, questioned the accuracy of the ruler. With his shortcomings exposed, great Gargantua lay prostrate upon the ground while Pantagruel sought to cover his cuirass in case his now governing body lost its sway. He was warned that the people would cut him no slacks, but he never listened, and had burned his britches behind him. Undaunted, he fulfilled his animus with the robes of his father, as uncomfortable as that might sound, and shaped the Metal "Unit" with his own hands.

The rule of Pantagruel was a discommoding morass, his armor eventually suffering a breach in the breech that proved his undoing. As his basket left the pantry, so to speak, his regime fell to insurrection, and so complete was the sacking that not even his Metal "Unit" could be found. The component pieces, a pantaloon triumvirate, were lost in the annals of time.

You now bear the awesome responsibility of the Metal "Unit." Gussets of wind, seams like reality, pockets of resistance, the seat of power, and legs as flared as your temper. Polish it well; the onus is now on you.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Magic Resistance: +20%
– Protects Against: Backstabs

Armor Class: -10
Dexterity Penalty: -15%
Speed Factor Penalty: +4
Physical Resistance Bonus: +20%
Arcane Casting Time Penalty: +4
Stealth Penalty: -80%
Requires:
 15 Strength

Weight: 60
Found within a long forgotten pocket of our collected pantology, herein tales the lie of the Metal "Unit."

Gargantua was self-proclaimed lord of his immeasurable lower regions until his son, Pantagruel, questioned the accuracy of the ruler. With his shortcomings exposed, great Gargantua lay prostrate upon the ground while Pantagruel sought to cover his cuirass in case his now governing body lost its sway. He was warned that the people would cut him no slacks, but he never listened, and had burned his britches behind him. Undaunted, he fulfilled his animus with the robes of his father, as uncomfortable as that might sound, and shaped the Metal "Unit" with his own hands.

The rule of Pantagruel was a discommoding morass, his armor eventually suffering a breach in the breech that proved his undoing. As his basket left the pantry, so to speak, his regime fell to insurrection, and so complete was the sacking that not even his Metal "Unit" could be found. The component pieces, a pantaloon triumvirate, were lost in the annals of time.

You now bear the awesome responsibility of the Metal "Unit." Gussets of wind, seams like reality, pockets of resistance, the seat of power, and legs as flared as your temper. Polish it well; the onus is now on you.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Classe d'armure de base : -10
- Classe d'armure : +2 contre les projectiles
- Classe d'armure : +2 contre les armes perforantes
- Classe d'armure : +3 contre les armes tranchantes
- Vitesse d'incantation des sorts profanes : -4
- Facteur de vitesse : -4
- Dextérité : -15 %
- Camouflage dans l'ombre : -80 %
- Furtivité : -80 %
- Résistance à la magie : +20 %
- Résistance aux dégâts physiques : +20 %
- Immunité aux attaques sournoises

Poids : 60

Nécessite : 
- Force : 15

SENDAI
Fléau d'armes drow + 3

- TAC0 de la main secondaire : -1
- Multiplicateur d'attaque sournoise : -3

- Inefficace contre les morts-vivants et les golems

- 76 % de chance d'empoisonner la cible et de lui infliger 1 point de dégâts par seconde pendant 10 secondes (jet de sauvegarde à -2 contre les souffles pour éviter)
- 25 % de chance de passer à 3 la force de la cible pendant 10 secondes (jet de sauvegarde à -2 contre les souffles pour éviter)
- 25 % de chance d'infliger lenteur à la cible pendant 5 rounds (jet de sauvegarde à -2 contre les sorts pour éviter)

Poigne électrique


Capacités de charge : 
- Inflige 1d8 +1 points de dégâts d'électricité à la cible (1 charge, l'objet est détruit quand la charge est utilisée)

Enchantement : +6
Dégâts : 1d2 
Type de dégâts : Mains nues
Facteur de vitesse : 1
Type de compétence : Grande épée
Type : Arme à 1 main

Poids : 0

Nécessite : 
- Force : 5

SHAKTI1
Épée courte +4


Capacités d'équipement : 
- TAC0 de la main secondaire : +1
- Compétence martiale Short Sword / Ninjato : Passe à 2
- Hâte

Enchantement : +4
TAC0 : +4
Dégâts : 1d6 +4
Type de dégâts : Tranchant
Facteur de vitesse : 3
Type de compétence : Short Sword / Ninjato
Type : Arme à 1 main

Poids : 2

Nécessite : 
- Force : 5
SHALT01
Anneau
Un anneau est une fine lanière de métal précieux. Il sert en général d'ornement. Plus rarement, certains sont enchantés et permettent à quiconque les porte d'user de la magie qu'ils contiennent. Ils sont de ce fait très recherchés par les aventuriers.

PARAMÈTRES :

Poids : 0
Un anneau est une fine lanière de métal précieux. Il sert en général d'ornement. Plus rarement, certains sont enchantés et permettent à quiconque les porte d'user de la magie qu'ils contiennent. Ils sont de ce fait très recherchés par les aventuriers.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Résistance aux poisons : +100 %
- Le moral du porteur reste au plus haut
- Immunité au sort Pluie des Dragons
- Immunité au sort Beauté de la Nature
- Immunité au sort Croissance végétale
- Immunité au sort Enchevêtrement
- Immunité à l'horreur
- Immunité à la panique
- Immunité à la peur
- Immunité au drain de niveaux
- Immunité aux charmes
- Immunité à la folie du berserker
- Immunité à la confusion
- Immunité à la pétrification
- Immunité à la fatigue
- Immunité aux poisons
- Immunité à la paralysie
- Immunité au sommeil
- Immunité à l'étourdissement

Poids : 0
SHAMMR
Marteau spirituel


Capacités d'équipement : 
- Multiplicateur d'attaque sournoise : -2

Enchantement : +1
TAC0 : +1
Dégâts : 1d4 +2
Type de dégâts : Contondant
Facteur de vitesse : 5
Type de compétence : Grande épée
Type : Arme à 1 main

Poids : 0

SHAMMR3
Marteau spirituel

- Multiplicateur d'attaque sournoise : -2

Enchantement : +3
TAC0 : +3

SHARARM
Sombremaille +3
Que ce soit du fait de sa conception ou d'une exposition à une chaleur intense au cours des batailles, les rangées de mailles de cette armure sont entièrement noircies. Bien que les légendes fassent plutôt référence à des chevaliers en armure étincelante affrontant de terribles monstres, les enchantements de résistance au feu sur celle-ci suggèrent des affrontements moins célèbres mais aussi terribles contre des créatures cracheuses de feu.

PARAMÈTRES :

Capacités d'équipement :
- Résistance au feu : +20 %

Classe d'armure : 2 (0 contre les armes tranchantes, 4 contre les armes contondantes)
Nécessite : 8 en Force

Poids : 9
Que ce soit du fait de sa conception ou d'une exposition à une chaleur intense au cours des batailles, les rangées de mailles de cette armure sont entièrement noircies. Bien que les légendes fassent plutôt référence à des chevaliers en armure étincelante affrontant de terribles monstres, les enchantements de résistance au feu sur celle-ci suggèrent des affrontements moins célèbres mais aussi terribles contre des créatures cracheuses de feu.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Classe d'armure de base : -4
- Classe d'armure : -1 contre les armes contondantes
- Classe d'armure : +1 contre les projectiles
- Classe d'armure : +1 contre les armes perforantes
- Classe d'armure : +2 contre les armes tranchantes
- Vitesse d'incantation des sorts profanes : -2 (excepté pour les bardes)
- Facteur de vitesse : -2
- Dextérité : -5 %
- Camouflage dans l'ombre : -40 %
- Furtivité : -40 %
- Résistance au feu : +50 %
- Résistance aux poisons : +100 %
- Résistance aux dégâts physiques : +10 %
- Le moral du porteur reste au plus haut
- Immunité à l'horreur
- Immunité à la peur
- Immunité à la panique
- Immunité à la confusion
- Immunité à la mort magique
- Immunité aux poisons
- Immunité à l'étourdissement

Poids : 9

Nécessite : 
- Force : 8
SHARSWD
Épée bâtarde + 1


Capacités d'équipement : 
- TAC0 de la main secondaire : -1
- Multiplicateur d'attaque sournoise : -2

Capacités de combat : 
- Inefficace contre les morts-vivants et les golems
- 51 % de chance d'être inefficace contre les cibles sensibles au poison
- 51 % de chance d'empoisonner la cible et de lui infliger 1 point de dégâts toutes les 5 secondes pendant 1 tour (jet de sauvegarde à -4 contre les souffles pour éviter)
- 51 % de chance de réduire de 1 la constitution de la cible pendant 1 tour (jet de sauvegarde à -4 contre les souffles pour éviter)
- 50 % de chance de réduire de 1 la dextérité de la cible pendant 1 tour (jet de sauvegarde à -4 contre les souffles pour éviter)
- 50 % de chance d'infliger lenteur à la cible pendant 1 tour (jet de sauvegarde à -4 contre les souffles pour éviter)

Enchantement : +4
TAC0 : +4
Dégâts : 1d10 +4
Type de dégâts : Tranchant
Facteur de vitesse : 7
Type de compétence : Épée bâtarde
Type : Arme à 1 main

Poids : 9

Nécessite : 
- Force : 11
SHILLE
Gourdin magique


TAC0 : +1
Dégâts : 2d4 
Type de dégâts : Contondant
Facteur de vitesse : 4
Type de compétence : Grande épée
Type : Arme à 1 main

Poids : 0

Nécessite : 
- Force : 5
SHLD01
Small Shield
A small shield is usually round and is carried on the forearm, gripped with the shield hand. Its light weight as compared to a medium shield permits the user to carry other items in that hand, although they cannot wield or carry another weapon.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Armor Class: +1

Arcane Casting Time Penalty: +1
Requires:
 6 Strength

Weight: 6
A small shield is usually round and is carried on the forearm, gripped with the shield hand. Its light weight as compared to a medium shield permits the user to carry other items in that hand, although they cannot wield or carry another weapon.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Classe d'armure : +1
- Vitesse d'incantation des sorts profanes : -1

Poids : 6

Nécessite : 
- Force : 6
SHLD01A
Small Shield
A small shield is usually round and is carried on the forearm, gripped with the shield hand. Its light weight as compared to a medium shield permits the user to carry other items in that hand, although they cannot wield or carry another weapon.

 6 Strength

SHLD02
Small Shield +1
A small shield is usually round and is carried on the forearm, gripped with the shield hand. Its light weight as compared to a medium shield permits the user to carry other items in that hand, although they cannot wield or carry another weapon. This magical shield grants an extra bonus of +1 against attacks.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Armor Class: +2

Arcane Casting Time Penalty: +1
Requires:
 6 Strength

Weight: 6
A small shield is usually round and is carried on the forearm, gripped with the shield hand. Its light weight as compared to a medium shield permits the user to carry other items in that hand, although they cannot wield or carry another weapon. This magical shield grants an extra bonus of +1 against attacks.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Classe d'armure : +2
- Vitesse d'incantation des sorts profanes : -1

Poids : 6

Nécessite : 
- Force : 6
SHLD02A
Small Shield +1
A small shield is usually round and is carried on the forearm, gripped with the shield hand. Its light weight as compared to a medium shield permits the user to carry other items in that hand, although they cannot wield or carry another weapon. This magical shield grants an extra bonus of +1 against attacks.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Armor Class: +2

Arcane Casting Time Penalty: +1
Requires:
 6 Strength

Weight: 6
A small shield is usually round and is carried on the forearm, gripped with the shield hand. Its light weight as compared to a medium shield permits the user to carry other items in that hand, although they cannot wield or carry another weapon. This magical shield grants an extra bonus of +1 against attacks.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Classe d'armure : +2
- Vitesse d'incantation des sorts profanes : -1

Poids : 6

Nécessite : 
- Force : 6
SHLD03
Medium Shield
A medium shield is carried in the same manner as a small shield. Unlike the small shield, however, its weight prevents the character from using his shield hand for anything other than carrying the medium shield. Medium shields are usually made of metal, range from three to four feet in diameter, and can be of any shape, from round to square to a spread dragon's wings. A typical medieval shield resembles a triangle with one point facing downward.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Armor Class: +2
– THAC0: -1

Arcane Casting Time Penalty: +2
Requires:
 12 Strength

Weight: 15
A medium shield is carried in the same manner as a small shield. Unlike the small shield, however, its weight prevents the character from using his shield hand for anything other than carrying the medium shield. Medium shields are usually made of metal, range from three to four feet in diameter, and can be of any shape, from round to square to a spread dragon's wings. A typical medieval shield resembles a triangle with one point facing downward.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Classe d'armure : +2
- TAC0 : -1
- Vitesse d'incantation des sorts profanes : -2

Poids : 15

Nécessite : 
- Force : 12
SHLD03A
Medium Shield
A medium shield is carried in the same manner as a small shield. Unlike the small shield, however, its weight prevents the character from using his shield hand for anything other than carrying the medium shield. Medium shields are usually made of metal, range from three to four feet in diameter, and can be of any shape, from round to square to a spread dragon's wings. A typical medieval shield resembles a triangle with one point facing downward.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Armor Class: +2
– THAC0: -1

Arcane Casting Time Penalty: +2
Requires:
 12 Strength

Weight: 15
A medium shield is carried in the same manner as a small shield. Unlike the small shield, however, its weight prevents the character from using his shield hand for anything other than carrying the medium shield. Medium shields are usually made of metal, range from three to four feet in diameter, and can be of any shape, from round to square to a spread dragon's wings. A typical medieval shield resembles a triangle with one point facing downward.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Classe d'armure : +2
- TAC0 : -1
- Vitesse d'incantation des sorts profanes : -2

Poids : 15

Nécessite : 
- Force : 12
SHLD04
Medium Shield +1
A medium shield is carried in the same manner as a small shield. Unlike the small shield, however, its weight prevents the character from using his shield hand for anything other than carrying the medium shield. Medium shields are usually made of metal, range from three to four feet in diameter, and can be of any shape, from round to square to a spread dragon's wings. A typical medieval shield resembles a triangle with one point facing downward. This magical shield grants an extra bonus of +1 against attacks.

– THAC0: -1

SHLD04P
Écu


Capacités d'équipement : 
- Classe d'armure : +2
- TAC0 : -1
- Vitesse d'incantation des sorts profanes : -2

Poids : 15

Nécessite : 
- Force : 12
SHLD05
Large Shield
The body shield, also known as the kite or tower shield, is a massive metal or wooden shield reaching nearly from the chin to the toe of the user. It must be firmly fastened to the forearm and the shield hand must firmly grip it at all times. Naturally, this precludes use of the shield hand for anything but holding the body shield in places and fighting results more difficult because of the shield's encumbrance.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Armor Class: +3
– THAC0: -2

Arcane Casting Time Penalty: +3
Requires:
 15 Strength

Weight: 45

Poids : 45

Nécessite : 
- Force : 15
SHLD07
Shield of the Falling Stars +2
Ilmater himself enchanted this shield upon seeing a young squire's willingness to endure untold agony for the well-being of his mount. During a fierce battle between a human cavalry division and a hobgoblin horde, the young man was sent for reinforcements. He was beset by a cascade of arrows that nearly blocked out the sun, and he knew that even if he avoided the arrows himself, should his horse fall he would surely be doomed. With his shield and body he positioned himself to take the brunt of the onslaught, and was mortally wounded for it. His horse remained unscathed allowing for their escape, and his body was carried back to the nearest town, where he was resurrected from death.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Armor Class: +5
– THAC0: -2
– Shield Others: allies within 5 ft. gain +2 to Armor Class

Arcane Casting Time Penalty: +3
Requires:
 15 Strength

Weight: 45
Ilmater himself enchanted this shield upon seeing a young squire's willingness to endure untold agony for the well-being of his mount. During a fierce battle between a human cavalry division and a hobgoblin horde, the young man was sent for reinforcements. He was beset by a cascade of arrows that nearly blocked out the sun, and he knew that even if he avoided the arrows himself, should his horse fall he would surely be doomed. With his shield and body he positioned himself to take the brunt of the onslaught, and was mortally wounded for it. His horse remained unscathed allowing for their escape, and his body was carried back to the nearest town, where he was resurrected from death.

- TAC0 : -2
- Vitesse d'incantation des sorts profanes : -3

SHLD07A
Shield of the Falling Stars +2

His horse remained unscathed allowing for their escape, and his body was carried back to the nearest town, where he was resurrected from death.

SHLD08
Buckler
A buckler, also known as a target shield, is a small shield of wood or metal that fastens to the forearm. Because of its size, it is light and can be worn with very little restriction to movement.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Armor Class: +1
– No protection against missile attacks

Requires:
 4 Strength

Weight: 4

SHLD11
Small Shield
A small shield is usually round and is carried on the forearm, gripped with the shield hand. Its light weight as compared to a medium shield permits the user to carry other items in that hand, although they cannot wield or carry another weapon.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Armor Class: +1

Arcane Casting Time Penalty: +1
Requires:
 6 Strength

Weight: 6

SHLD13
Medium Shield
A medium shield is carried in the same manner as a small shield. Unlike the small shield, however, its weight prevents the character from using his shield hand for anything other than carrying the medium shield. Medium shields are usually made of metal, range from three to four feet in diameter, and can be of any shape, from round to square to a spread dragon's wings. A typical medieval shield resembles a triangle with one point facing downward.

Arcane Casting Time Penalty: +3
Requires:
 15 Strength

Weight: 45
The body shield, also known as the kite or tower shield, is a massive metal or wooden shield reaching nearly from the chin to the toe of the user. It must be firmly fastened to the forearm and the shield hand must firmly grip it at all times. Naturally, this precludes use of the shield hand for anything but holding the body shield in places and fighting results more difficult because of the shield's encumbrance.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Classe d'armure : +2 contre les projectiles
- Classe d'armure : +3
- TAC0 : -2
- Vitesse d'incantation des sorts profanes : -3

Poids : 45

Nécessite : 
- Force : 15
SHLD17
Buckler +1
A buckler, also known as a target shield, is a small shield of wood or metal that fastens to the forearm. Because of its size, it is light and can be worn with very little restriction to movement. This buckler has some form of generic enchantment, making it more resistant to blows.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Armor Class: +2
– No protection against missile attacks

Requires:
 4 Strength

Weight: 4

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Classe d'armure : -2 contre les projectiles
- Classe d'armure : +2

Poids : 4

- Force : 15
SHLD19
Pellan's Shield +2
This dwarven-made shield was commissioned by Pellan of Tyr, a brash paladin known for unquestioning courage and an almost total lack of common sense. Upon hearing that a red dragon was ravaging the countryside, Pellan mounted his horse and rode off to do battle. As it happened, Pellan and his armor digested readily enough, but the shield gave the dragon severe stomach cramps. Subsequently coughed up, it lay in a hoard for years until retrieved by Pellan's son, a warrior who knew when to sneak.

Superior craftsmanship is supplemented by a permanent lightness spell, which makes the shield very easy to wield.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Armor Class: +5
– THAC0: -2

Arcane Casting Time Penalty: +3
Requires:
 12 Strength

Weight: 45
This dwarven-made shield was commissioned by Pellan of Tyr, a brash paladin known for unquestioning courage and an almost total lack of common sense. As it happened, Pellan and his armor digested readily enough, but the shield gave the dragon severe stomach cramps. Subsequently coughed up, it lay in a hoard for years until retrieved by Pellan's son, a warrior who knew when to sneak.

Superior craftsmanship is supplemented by a permanent lightness spell, which makes the shield very easy to wield.

SHLD20
Kiel's Buckler +2
This is the buckler of Kiel the Legion-Killer, first-born son of Durlag Trollkiller and Clan-prince of his father's ill-fated tower. He was wielding it in his final hour as he rushed to warn his father of the doppelgangers' infiltration of their Clan-home. This light weight shield of excellent craftsmanship bears powerful magical enhancements, and it is said that part of Kiel's force of will imprinted itself upon this shield.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Armor Class: +3
– No protection against missile attacks
– Protects Against: Hold and Stun

Requires:
 4 Strength

Weight: 4

SHLD21
Red Dragonscale Shield +2
Another powerful item created by the warlock Wormsor, this shield consists of red dragon skin stretched over a heavy shield frame. The red background is adorned in a pattern that, when looked in the right way, reveals the face of an ancient dragon. Crafted to withstand a mighty red dragon's breath, the shield is also able to absorb shock waves of any kind of source (wing buffets, physical attacks, telekinesis, etc.).

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Armor Class: +4
– THAC0: -1
– Fire Resistance: +25%
– Force Absorbing: wielder gains +3 to saves vs. breath and is immune to everything that pushes them away

Arcane Casting Time Penalty: +2
Requires:
 10 Strength

Weight: 10
Another powerful item created by the warlock Wormsor, this shield consists of red dragon skin stretched over a heavy shield frame. The red background is adorned in a pattern that, when looked in the right way, reveals the face of an ancient dragon. Crafted to withstand a mighty red dragon's breath, the shield is also able to absorb shock waves of any kind of source (wing buffets, physical attacks, telekinesis, etc.).

- Classe d'armure : +4
- TAC0 : -1
- Jets de sauvegarde : +3 contre les souffles
- Vitesse d'incantation des sorts profanes : -2
- Résistance au feu : +25 %
- Immunité au renversement

Poids : 10

Nécessite : 
- Force : 10
SHLD22
Mirror Shield +3
Angwile the Artificer was widely known among the svirfneblin as the foremost authority on beholders. While he was often derided during his lifetime as foolhardy and reckless, his studies of captive beholders led to the creation of many artifacts that are to this day highly sought after by deep gnomes and other denizens of the Underdark.

Among Angwile's most well-known creation there's the Mirror Shield. This shield looks and works like a normal shield, but instead of a coat-of-arms, the front is mirror-reflective, and the inside is crystal clear. The wearer can cover behind the shield and look through its clear surface, while beholder's rays are deflected away, and gaze attacks are nullified as opponents see their own reflected image.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Armor Class: +5
– THAC0: -1
– Protects Against: Gaze/ray attacks

Arcane Casting Time Penalty: +2
Requires:
 12 Strength

Weight: 15
Angwile the Artificer was widely known among the svirfneblin as the foremost authority on beholders. While he was often derided during his lifetime as foolhardy and reckless, his studies of captive beholders led to the creation of many artifacts that are to this day highly sought after by deep gnomes and other denizens of the Underdark.

Among Angwile's most well-known creation there's the Mirror Shield. This shield looks and works like a normal shield, but instead of a coat-of-arms, the front is mirror-reflective, and the inside is crystal clear. The wearer can cover behind the shield and look through its clear surface, while beholder's rays are deflected away, and gaze attacks are nullified as opponents see their own reflected image.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Classe d'armure : +5
- TAC0 : -1
- Vitesse d'incantation des sorts profanes : -2
- Immunité au sort Vaporisation prismatique
- Immunité au sort Rayon rubis d'inversion
- Immunité au sort Rayon débilitant
- Immunité au sort Incinérateur d'Agannazar
- Immunité contre les attaques de regard

Poids : 15

Nécessite : 
- Force : 12
SHLD23
Fortress Shield +3
This shield, as tall as a man, is aptly named. With it, Phil Pious, a paladin of the Most Noble Order of the Radiant Heart, once held a marauding battalion of hobgoblin and kobold archers at bay till they exhausted their arrows. As the shield is almost as useful in melee as it is at range, he then slew each and every creature.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Armor Class: +6
– THAC0: -2
– Physical Resistance: +10%

Arcane Casting Time Penalty: +3
Requires:
 15 Strength

Weight: 45

As the shield is almost as useful in melee as it is at range, he then slew each and every creature.

- Classe d'armure : +2 contre les projectiles
- Classe d'armure : +6
- TAC0 : -2
- Vitesse d'incantation des sorts profanes : -3
- Résistance aux dégâts physiques : +10 %

Poids : 45

Nécessite : 
- Force : 15
SHLD23A
Bouclier Forteresse +3
Ce bouclier presque aussi grand qu'un homme porte bien son nom. Avec, Phil Pieux, paladin de l'Ordre du Cœur Radieux, pût tenir en respect un bataillon d'archers hobgobelins et kobolds en maraude jusqu'à ce qu'ils aient épuisés leurs flèches. Comme le bouclier est presque aussi efficace dans la mêlée qu'à distance, il extermina ensuite ces créatures jusqu'à la dernière.
